cheatsheet.title: Application Deployment -- install and uninstall a software

intro.description: This cheat sheet will show you how to install a software package on computing elements and how to remove them

item.title: Open the g-Eclipse user perspective
item.description: If you are not already in the g-Eclipse user perspective, in the main menu select Window > Open Perspective > g-Eclipse (User) or click on the "Click to Perform" link below.

item.title: Lauch the deployment wizard
item.description: Right-click on the CE(s) in the Computing folder and choose Operator's job or open a Operator's job view and start a new test.

item.title: Select the deployment target
item.description: Select one or more computing elements on which the software will be installed.

item.title: Select the deployment source
item.description: Choose the software to install from referenced project or from a Grid connection

item.title: Specify a tag
item.description: Give the installed software a tag for identification

item.title: Uninstall an application
item.description: Strat the Test Wizard as described previoursly. Select Application Uninstall and give the script that describes how to remove the software.
